title: Serial Killer Horror Thriller 'Ed Kemper' Trailer Starring Lew Temple
description: "All I want... is for you to be proud of me." Dread has revealed an official trailer for an indie horror thriller film titled Ed Kemper, a story about the serial killer named Ed Kemper, Jr. This is set for release in April in a few theaters and on VOD if anyone is interested. The only thing that sells now is true crime and murder mysteries! This is the chilling true story of Ed Kemper, a manipulative serial killer whose charm hid a dark obsession with murder, revenge, and his tormented past. Based on actual events surrounding the American serial killer Edmund Kemper, who murdered his grandparents at age 15 and, after being paroled for that crime, then killed eight women in 1972 and 1973 including his own mother. This is the chilling true story of Ed Kemper, a manipulative serial killer whose charm hid a dark obsession with murder, revenge, and his tormented past. Based on actual events surrounding the American serial killer Edmund Kemper, who murdered his grandparents at age 15 and, after being paroled for that crime, then killed eight women in 1972 and 1973 including his own mother. Writer Stephen Johnston explains: "I originally envisioned Ed Kemper as having a sort of punk rock horror energy, and seeing that realized by Chad Ferrin’s sure-handed direction, deft performances from the cast, and the hard work of a great crew... has truly been magical. This looks like a really bad student film - don't waste any of your time on this. Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Chad Ferrin's horror movie Ed Kemper, direct from YouTube: This story is based on actual events. Chad Ferrin's horror feature Ed Kemper follows the horrifying true story of Ed Kemper (starring Lew Temple), a cunning and sadistic serial killer shaped by childhood abuse, whose charming facade masked his grotesque obsession with murder, mutilation, and the ultimate act of revenge against the woman who scarred him most—his mother. Ed Kemper is directed by American B-movie filmmaker Chad Ferrin, director of many genre films including Parasites, The Chair, Attack in LA, Exorcism at 60,000 Feet, Night Caller, Pig Killer, Scalper, and H.P. Lovecraft's the Old Ones previously, plus other horror projects. The screenplay is written by Chad Ferrin and Stephen Johnston. Produced by Michael Conroy, Chad Ferrin, Silawn Lewis, and Jeff Olan. Dread will debut the Ed Kemper film in select US theaters on April 4th, 2025, and also on VOD starting April 8th soon this spring. Anyone into this story?
